name: aromatherapy
effect: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
short_effect: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.x-y: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
